old:
戦徒リュカによって導かれた先の島の入り江
空には常に暗雲が厚く漂い、島の位置はおろか
現在の時間すら推し量ることができない
岩場の険しさや荒れ果てた様子から、生者が
居ないことだけは確かなようだ
new:
Led by the Myrmidon Lyka, we arrive at an inlet on the remote island. 
The sky is always filled with thick dark clouds, so much so that it is impossible to even determine the current time. 
The treacherous cliffs and desolate appearance suggest that there are no living beings present.
